job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Backend Engineer - PerfectScale by DoiT
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Senior Backend Engineer, you will be working on the core backend solutions, powering PerfectScale data pipeline and business logic. You'll be collaborating with product managers, and developers from other teams and also participate in product-making decisions., * Collaborate with product, devops, backend and frontend engineers to deliver elegant and well thought out solutions for complex problems
     * Implementing features. From the proposal through design and implementation to maintenance. You're expected to propose things that you think can be an excellent addition to the products
     * Write clean and maintainable code using engineering best practices, you will also ensure clean code and best practices while performing code reviews for your peers
     * Improving the health of the codebase. We're mindful of accumulating technical debt. We dedicate one day per week to housekeeping
     * Providing feedback. The team plans and discusses the upcoming work. We provide feedback to each other, trying to find challenges and unknowns as early as possible
job_details.full_text:
Senior Backend Engineer - PerfectScale by DoiT

As a Senior Backend Engineer, you will be working on the core backend solutions, powering PerfectScale data pipeline and business logic. You'll be collaborating with product managers, and developers from other teams and also participate in product-making decisions., * Collaborate with product, devops, backend and frontend engineers to deliver elegant and well thought out solutions for complex problems
     * Implementing features. From the proposal through design and implementation to maintenance. You're expected to propose things that you think can be an excellent addition to the products
     * Write clean and maintainable code using engineering best practices, you will also ensure clean code and best practices while performing code reviews for your peers
     * Improving the health of the codebase. We're mindful of accumulating technical debt. We dedicate one day per week to housekeeping
     * Providing feedback. The team plans and discusses the upcoming work. We provide feedback to each other, trying to find challenges and unknowns as early as possible

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional backend software engineering tasks such as writing clean code, code reviews, and improving codebase health. While it mentions collaboration with other teams and product-making decisions, there is no explicit mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies, making it difficult to classify within the provided AI-focused profiles.

phrases: working on the core backend solutions
implementing features
From the proposal through design and implementation to maintenance
Write clean and maintainable code using engineering best practices
performing code reviews for your peers
Improving the health of the codebase
dedicate one day per week to housekeeping
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the design, development, and maintenance of software systems, which are core aspects of software development.

phrases: powering PerfectScale data pipeline and business logic
collaborating with product managers
participate in product-making decisions
Collaborate with product, devops, backend and frontend engineers
deliver elegant and well thought out solutions for complex problems
You're expected to propose things that you think can be an excellent addition to the products
The team plans and discusses the upcoming work
provide feedback to each other, trying to find challenges and unknowns as early as possible
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate involvement in understanding business needs, collaborating with product teams, contributing to product strategy, and participating in team planning and feedback sessions.

phrases: Collaborate with product, devops, backend and frontend engineers
job_tasks.justification: Mentioning collaboration with 'devops' engineers suggests an awareness of operational aspects, though not directly performing MLOps tasks.

phrases: collaborating with product managers, and developers from other teams
Collaborate with product, devops, backend and frontend engineers
provide feedback to each other
soft_skills.justification: These phrases highlight the need to work effectively with various teams and stakeholders, and to share information and ideas.

phrases: deliver elegant and well thought out solutions for complex problems
Improving the health of the codebase
trying to find challenges and unknowns as early as possible
soft_skills.justification: The description emphasizes solving complex problems, maintaining code quality, and proactively identifying issues.

phrases: participate in product-making decisions
You're expected to propose things that you think can be an excellent addition to the products
soft_skills.justification: These phrases suggest a role where the individual is encouraged to contribute ideas and take initiative in product development.

phrases: From the proposal through design and implementation to maintenance
soft_skills.justification: The end-to-end responsibility for features implies a need to adapt to different stages of the development lifecycle.
